channel.title: Project Backlog on Mark Spicer
channel.description: Recent content in Project Backlog on Mark Spicer

item.title: Initial Commit
item.description: Over the last several years of my life, I have spent a lot of time doing things and not nearly enough time talking about them. This rendered my previous personal website with very little content and leaves the personal projects I’ve invested well too much time on unknown to the world. Beyond simply sharing my work, I’m interested in a more formalized and public retrospective where I take time to think about the lessons I’ve learned.
